text: Aliye Berger (24 December 1903 - 9 August 1974) was a Turkish artist, engraver, and painter. Berger is one of the first engravers of Turkish Republic. She is known for her expressionist engravings and winning the painting competition of Yapı Kredi Bank in 1954. ==Biography== Berger was born on 24 December 1903 in Büyükada, İstanbul, Turkey.Necmi Sönmez, Berger 100 Yaşına Bastı, Radikal gazetesi 24.12.2003 Her father was Kabaağaçlı Şakir Paşa and mother Giritli Sare İsmail Hanım.
